# (APPENDIX) Appendix {-}

# Individual plots

```{r appA-transfer-plot, fig.cap="Individual responses in transfer phase", out.width="100%", out.height="95%", cache=TRUE}
transfer %>% 
  ggplot(aes(img_x, img_y, fill = response)) +
  facet_wrap(~subj_id) +
  geom_tile(size = .2, color = "white") +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Set1") +
  theme_subjects +
  theme(legend.position = "none",
        strip.text = element_blank(),
        panel.spacing = unit(2, "pt"))
```
